'''Notes'''
Great laptop for the choice of running Linux. All hardware works nicely with Ubuntu 10.10 and 2.6.35-25-generic #44-Ubuntu SMP Fri Jan 21 17:40:48 UTC 2011 i686 GNU/Linux apart from WI-FI. To make wireless Broadcom BCM4312 card working you have to use proprietary drivers from jockey database (system -> administration -> additional drivers)
